title: Do people dress up for the LCS games?
body: I'm not sure if I should cosplay or not, but I have an Annie costume, and would enjoy wearing it, unless no one dresses up.

replies.body:
Yes.

http://na.lolesports.com/sites/default/files/_K1P7030_0.jpg

That was me for Day 1. I am going to refine the costume and show more TSM pride next time I go (probably March or April for the C9 rematch)
I wonder if you are the Annie I saw in the front row of today's games!
I think you'll be in good company.

You will be among a common audience of people loving league, while I cannot say I have witnessed any (as I have never gone to LCS T_T), I would imagine it's equivelent to fans in football with the facepaint and what-not. I say go for it!
yeah they do. i was there today and i saw a pretty sweet frosted ezreal and 2 officer caitlyns lol
I'm going in full Lux force tomorrow.  Who cares if no one else is dressed up?  It's the league of misfits baby!
